jobDescription: Job title: Data Analyst IILocation: Seattle, WADuration: 1 year W2 contractJob Duties: The Data Analyst is responsible for ensuring the efficiency of Oculus’ cross-functional product safety team, tracking field reports, identifying areas for improvement, and building both long term and ad-hoc solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical, analytical, and operational background. Job Skills:Create and iterate on solutions and dashboards to empower operational and exploratory analysisEnforce best practices and alignment with research, analytics, and engineering teamsEffectively communicate with external clients and internal teams to deliver solutions in a timely fashionRespond to (or triage) any and all requests related to customer report data with minimal guidance or oversightDocument requirements with stakeholders, and partner with Legal and Safety teams on broader changes to core dashboards and solutionsPreferred Qualifications:SQL and Tableau proficiency is preferred2+ years experience with SQL (or similar language aimed at querying relational databases)The ability to have effective conversations with cross-functional teams about their support needs and requirementsEnjoys working primarily onsite in a team-oriented environment and highly motivated to provide a positive user experienceStrong project management skillsExperience with data management, specifically with validating and auditing data and reports from multiple systemsExperience manipulating large data sets through statistical software or other methodsEducation:BA/BS in a field that emphasizes data analysis and visualization (e. g., computer science, social sciences, physical sciences, math, engineering, or statistics), or equivalent work experience2+ years of experience working with data visualization toolsKnowledge with Excel (conditional formulas and formatting, charting, etc.)Experience initiating and driving projects to completion with minimal guidanceExperience processing and analyzing data sets, interpreting them for making business decisionsExperience communicating the results of analyses with product and leadership teams to influence the overall strategy of the productExperience working in a customer service or support organization as well as handling sensitive dataRequired skills:DATA ANALYSTDATA REPORTINGFIELD INSPECTIONDATABASE ADMINISTRATIONTECHNICAL CUSTOMER SUPPORT
